competitors.name: BMC Remedy
competitors.notes: Established enterprise ITSM platform, one of the dominant players before ServiceNow's rise

competitors.name: HP Service Manager
competitors.notes: Legacy enterprise ITSM solution widely used in large organizations

competitors.name: CA Service Desk Manager
competitors.notes: Computer Associates' ITSM offering for enterprise IT management

context: In 2005, ServiceNow was only one year old (founded 2004) and had minimal market presence. The ITSM market was dominated by traditional on-premise solutions like BMC Remedy, HP Service Manager, and CA Service Desk Manager. ServiceNow would not go public until 2012.
